current.slide-1-title: Your backstage pass to better wines
current.slide-1-mobile-text-1: 4 hand-picked wines delivered every 4 weeks for only £20*
current.slide-3-title: Better wine discovered just for you
current.slide-3-small-text: At taste4, we hunt down the small, independent, off the beaten wine makers to bring you fresh and exciting wines not available on the usual supermarket shelves. Our passion is only matched by our good taste, so why not check our latests bunch of wines...
current.home-full-width-1-text: This section is designed to showcase your product philosophy. Display up to three Full-Width Features, either as images or videos. Expand on each feature with a title, text and call to action button.

current.home-left-right-1-text: It's where it all started, we wanted to discover better wine, we knew it was out there, we'd seen it for ourselves. We have the contacts, we have the knowledge and now we have the wine and we want to share it with you.
current.home-left-right-2-text: At taste4, we hunt down smaller, independent wine makers to bring you fresh and exciting wines you won't see on the supermarket shelves.
current.home-left-right-3-text: Every case comes with the inside stories behind the wines, plus foodie tips if that's your bag.
current.home-left-right-4-text: We pour all our passion for wine into our selections, so we're pretty confident you'll love them too. If you aren't happy, have your money back.
current.home-feature-full-width-1-title: 4 handpicked wines delivered to your door every 4 weeks for just £20
current.home-feature-full-width-1-text: Let's be frank here, buying wine is a royal pain in the proverbial. We are about to change that for you!
current.home-voucher-feature-1-text: What are you waiting for? It's time to take advantage of your discount and start your wine discovery.
current.home-twitter-carousel-text: Join 'our' merry band of e-Vin-gelists sharing their unboxing pics and giving us their take on the wines.
current.home-in-line-1-title: Choose red or white ... or both
current.home-in-line-1-text: First off, tip us the nod whether you prefer red or white wine. Can't decide? No problem - we'll sort out a delicious selection of both.
current.home-in-line-2-text: We'll curate an awesome foursome of the best handcrafted wines we've discovered – and pop 4 bottles into one of our special boxes.
current.home-in-line-3-text: Every 4 weeks we deliver 4 bottles, wherever works for you. Home? Office? No probs. A handy drop-off point? All fine and just £35 delivered.
current.home-in-line-4-title: Then comes the most important bit!
current.home-in-line-4-text: Grab your wine glasses and start enjoying the fab 4 wines we've chosen specially for you ... and the inside stories behind them.

current.home-in-line-two-1-title: Wines from off the beaten track
current.collection-subscription-red: Get 4 expertly curated reds with the emphasis on big, rich flavours with no rough edges.
current.collection-subscription-white: If white is your bag, we think you’ll love pulling these 4 juicy whites from the fridge door.
current.collection-subscription-mix: Best of both worlds – two juicy whites and two flavoursome reds.
current.collection-subscription-info: ...Red, white or mixed it’s the easiest decision you’ll make today.
current.extra-information-text-1: Place your order by 2pm for next-day delivery (takes slightly longer for Highlands, islands ...
current.extra-information-text-2: All taste4 wines are picked because they taste great right now – there's no need to wait.
current.extra-information-text-3: We're only happy when you are, so if a wine doesn't impress you'll get your money back.
current.cart-multiple-txt: Be aware that non subscription items must be multiple of 4 due to package.
